Instant Escape.name: Instant Escape
Instant Escape.trigger: An effect immobilizes, restrains, or slows you.
Instant Escape.effect: The triggering effect ends on you. You then shift up to 2 squares.

Cat Burglar's Gambit.name: Cat Burglar's Gambit
Cat Burglar's Gambit.flavor: You spring into action, expertly strike, and then sidestep to position yourself for either certain glory or imminent doom.
Cat Burglar's Gambit.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Cat Burglar's Gambit.effect: You shift up to 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Redirected Death.name: Redirected Death
Redirected Death.flavor: Your enemy strikes out against you, but with a slight move and a flourish of your own blade, you redirect the attack toward a different target.
Redirected Death.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack, and it can reach another enemy of yours.
Redirected Death.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Redirected Death.onHit: The target’s attack misses you and hits an enemy of your choice within range of the target’s attack.
